annotations.description: Prodigy hyper-polyglot Tim Doner has been teaching himself languages since he was 13.  He now speaks nearly 20 languages!  Join Tim on a cultural tour of New...
annotations.title: Teen Speaks Over 20 Languages

textContent:
https://youtu.be/Km9-DiFaxpU as you can see on this movie we have to learn foreign languages with with enthusiasm and like him and he writes he writes by hand what what she could what she can't and while watching TV show and movie and in the language he is studying
Mr Imani in the Mr Taco and said that studying for your language I need tremendous amount of tremendous hours time I couldn't express myself in English
